item.title: Let It Go
item.description: In our lives we get attach to a lot of things. We hold on to material things. We hold on to our old conceptions, opinions and prejudices. Developing this sort of attachment is common. Often this is needed. Commitment, dedication and perseverance are needed to succeed in our professional and personal lives. But at times we must let these things go. We must refine our understanding and if needed change our course of action.
